item.title: Tidyverse: Getting Your Feet Wet
item.description:
Context Reflection Resources Up Front tibble %>% “Tidy” Data select() columns filter() Rows mutate() Columns arrange() Rows group_by() for Grouped Data summarize() Image credit to R Memes for Statistical Fiends
Context I recently had the opportunity to teach some tidyverse code to colleagues and classmates in a series of workshops. Some had already dabbled in R or other programming languages, but it was the first time that the majority of participants had written a single line of code.
